    Documentation Updates

    Below are documentation updates for August-September 2021.

    Index of all documentation updates

    24-September-2021

    New Docs

    • Title: Auto Captions
    • Description: This topic contains details for encoding settings related to automatically generating captions for your videos when they are processed.
    • Link: https://zencoder.support.brightcove.com/encoding-settings/assets/encoding-settings-auto-captions.html
    • Category: Zencoder
    • Title: Player Debug Mode
    • Description: In this topic, you will learn how to use the Brightcove Player debug mode.
    • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/troubleshooting/player-debug-mode.html
    • Category: Brightcove Player

    Major updates

    • Title: Receiving In-App Purchase Notifications
    • Description: Added some missing information
    • Link: https://beacon.support.brightcove.com/monetization/general/receive-iap-notifications.html
    • Category: Beacon monetization
    • Title: Step-by-Step: Streaming a Secure Reliable Transport (SRT) Live event
    • Description: Added information on CIDR whitelists
    • Link: https://live.support.brightcove.com/get-started/step-step-live-srt.html
    • Category: Live
    • Title: Creating and Managing Live Events using the Live Module
    • Description: Added information on CIDR whitelists
    • Link: https://live.support.brightcove.com/live-module/creating-and-managing-live-events-using-live-module.html
    • Category: Live
    • Title: Creating a JSON Web Token (JWT)
    • Description: Added flags for the prid and vids JWT claims
    • Link: https://general.support.brightcove.com/developer/create-json-web-token.html#Claims_for_Playback_Restrictions
    • Category: Playback Restrictions, JWT

    Minor updates

    • Title: Working with Labels
    • Description: Corrected some misleading code
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/cms/managing-videos/working-with-labels.html#creating_managing_labels
    • Category: CMS API
    • Title: Overview: Cloud Playout
    • Description: Added note that activation takes up to 2 minutes, so that needs to be taken into account in the Start Time
    • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/cloud-playout/cloud-playout-overview.html#limitations
    • Category: Cloud Playout
    • Title: Dimension Guides
    • Description: Fixed an issue in all dimension guides that prevented sample requests from working
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/analytics/dimension-guides/index.html
    • Category: Analytics API
    • Title: Overview: Brightcove Player SDK for iOS
    • Description: Added support for iOS 15
    • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/ios/basics/overview-brightcove-player-sdk-ios.html
    • Category: Native SDKs
    • Title: Overview: Brightcove Player SDK for tvOS
    • Description: Added support for tvOS 15
    • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/tvos/basics/overview-brightcove-player-sdk-tvos.html
    • Category: Native SDKs
    • Title: The Brightcove Native SDKs
    • Description: Added support for iOS 15 and tvOS 15
    • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/getting-started/brightcove-native-player-sdks.html
    • Category: Native SDKs
    • Title: Creating a Playlist
    • Description: Add details on playlist manipulation after creation
    • Link: https://beacon.support.brightcove.com/using-brightcove-beacon/creating-a-playlist.html
    • Category: Brightcove Beacon Classic

    17-September-2021

    New Docs

    • Title: Automatically Generating Captions for Videos
    • Description: In this topic you will learn how to automatically generate video captions.
    • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/media/generating-captions-videos.html

    • Category: Video Cloud
    • Title: Requesting Auto Captions
    • Description: This topic explains how to request the generation of captions from audio tracks in your video using the Dynamic Ingest API.
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/dynamic-ingest/ingest-guides/requesting-auto-captions.html
    • Category: Captions, Dynamic Ingest API
    • Title: Setup Automatic Email on Documentation Updates
    • Description: In this topic, you will learn how to use Distill to watch the documents updates page and automatically be emailed a notice that updates have changed.
    • Link: https://support.brightcove.com/distill-setup.html
    • Category: General Documentation

    Major updates

    • Title: Creating a JSON Web Token (JWT)

    • Link: https://general.support.brightcove.com/developer/create-json-web-token.html#Claims_for_Playback_Restrictions
    • Category: Playback Restrictions, Delivery Rules, JWT
    • Title: Video SEO Schema Generator Plugin
    • Description: Updated note steps for setting BC Player configuration to turn off Flash
    • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/video-seo-schema-generator-plugin.html#Plugin_options
    • Category: Brightcove Player

    • Category: Captions, Dynamic Ingest API

    Minor updates

    • Title: Implementing Delivery Rules
    • Description: Added note that drules set in the JWT override rules set at the account level
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/delivery-rules/getting-started/implementing-delivery-rules.html#Scope
    • Category: Delivery Rules
    • Title: Overview: Live API
    • Description: Add link to Live Scheduling doc for SEP jobs.
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/live-api/getting-started/overview-brightcove-live-api.html#Static_entry_points
    • Category: Live, SEP
    • Title: AMP Using External Videos
    • Description: Updated some broken links.
    • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/amp/amp-using-external-video.html#Resources_from_AMP
    • Category: AMP, Brightcove PLayer
    • Title: Uploading Videos Using Remote URLs
    • Description: Updated note on Dropbox to indicate that spaces in folder/filenames must be removed for uploads to work (URI-encoding spaces is not sufficient).
    • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/media/uploading-videos-remote-urls.html#dropbox
    • Category: Upload Module
    • Title: Uploading Videos Using the Upload Module
    • Description: Updated note on Dropbox to indicate that spaces in folder/filenames must be removed for uploads to work (URI-encoding spaces is not sufficient).
    • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/media/uploading-videos-using-upload-module.html#upload
    • Category: Upload Module
    • Title: Brightcove Live API: Server-Side Ad Insertion (SSAI)
    • Description: Added note that only segment-accurate ad insertion is enabled for AES Live jobs by default. Frame accurate insertion requires account configuration by Support
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/live-api/ssai/live-api-server-side-ad-insertion-ssai.html
    • Category: Live, AES, SSAI
    • Title: Implementing Server-Side Ads in the Live Module
    • Description: Added note that only segment-accurate ad insertion is enabled for AES Live jobs by default. Frame accurate insertion requires account configuration by Support
    • Link: https://live.support.brightcove.com/live-module/implementing-server-side-ads-live-module.html
    • Category: Live, AES, SSAI
    • Title: Creating and Managing Live Events using the Live Module
    • Description: Added undocumented error that may occur when several live jobs are created in one region in quick succession
    • Link: https://live.support.brightcove.com/live-module/creating-and-managing-live-events-using-live-module.html#Limitations
    • Category: Live
    • Title: Live API: Error Messages
    • Description: Added undocumented error that may occur when several live jobs are created in one region in quick succession
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/live-api/references/live-api-error-messages.html
    • Category: Live
    • Title: Managing Text Tracks Using the CMS API
    • Description: Added note on how to delete text tracks via the CMS API
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/cms/managing-videos/managing-text-tracks.html
    • Category: Text Tracks, Captions, CMS API

    • Title: Known Issues: Studio and Brightcove Player
    • Description: Known Live issue: Recurring events still published when inactive show 3 segments of playback
    • Link: https://general.support.brightcove.com/support/known-issues-studio-brightcove-player-and-apis.html
    • Category: Brightcove Live
    • Title: Codecs and Formats
    • Description: Updated to mention newer video codecs that are supported
    • Link: https://zencoder.support.brightcove.com/general-information/faq-codecs-and-formats.html
    • Category: Zencoder
